title: A cult, murder, and 'The Butcher' on TV tonight
text:
Cape Town – Kick off the brand new week with two new shows and a reality competition about butchers.

From a new local drama about a cult, to the final season of How To Get Away with Murder and the world's best butchers (yes you heard that right) battling it out - here are our top 3 TV picks for tonight.

iThemba

20:00 - Mzansi Magic (DStv 161)

This new 13-part series revolves around a shocking discovery made by Philiswa, a 21-year-old university student from Port Elizabeth. She reveals a mysterious set of circumstances and string of blood curdling secrets brought about by the disappearance of her older sister Nomonde all at the hands of the leaders of a religious cult called the Kingdom of Blessings.

More magic for Mzansi as we premiere the edge-of-your-seat drama, #iThemba tonight at 20:00! — Mzansi Magic (@Mzansimagic) October 7, 2019

How to Get Away with Murder

20:30 - 1Magic (DStv 103)

The season six premiere of the final season picks up as Annalise struggles with the personal toll that Laurel and Christopher's disappearance has taken on everyone.

The Butcher

DStv Now Catch Up

In this extreme, high-stakes competition where the best butchers battle in a showdown designed to put their knowledge, strategy, and technique to the ultimate test, with their sharp knives and even sharper skills, these butchers carve their way through painstaking challenges, use their expert talent to adapt to historical twists and reveal the fascinating secrets of the butcher’s world.

Compiled by Leandra Engelbrecht.
